title: Hand drawn serif font used on Japanese site
content: Looks handlettered to me. None of the L's are the same, nor the I's.
author: pattyfab

comments.content: the Kill Bill font resembles [blindfold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143415/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=2477) a free font.
